channel.title: where are the saved files?
channel.description: Going to switch to the Steam version and want to copy my saved files and cannot seem to find any.

item.title: where are the saved files?
item.dc:creator: CPU
item.description:
Unfortunately, you can’t use old save files with the new release.

“We are not physically able to support old save games. When the game binaries change in a certain way, save games break because they rely on old binaries. This is impossible to work around.”

Read full topic
